thread.title: Save 85% on a golf privilege card
thread.title_full: Save 85% on a golf privilege card - Telegraph

author: The Telegraph
title: Save 85% on a golf privilege card
text: Telegraph readers can claim discounts and benefits at over 1,000 golf courses in the UK and Europe with an 18-month Open Fairways membership for only £14.99 (normally £133.50). The Open Fairways privilege card gives you: - Up to 50% off green fees, for one to eight golfers - Up to 50% off the rack room rate or 10% off the best available rate at more than 150 hotels in Ireland, such as the Fitzwilliam Hotel Dublin, The Culloden and Clarion Hotel Limerick To see a list of participating greens and hotels, click here. How to Claim: See the newspaper on Sunday, July 26, 2015 telegraph.co.uk Follow @telegraph
